content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': "This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs per my latest actions, I received a list of popular online games from the 'google' command and attempted to play games on Poki.com using the 'xdg-open' command. In the latest development, I tried to browse the website 'https://www.gamesradar.com/best-online-games/' using the 'browse_website' command and received an error message stating that the terminal type is unknown and the 'xdg-open' command could not find the necessary programs to open the website."}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The article lists 25 of the best online games to play today, including popular titles such as Fortnite, League of Legends, and Super Smash Bros. Ultimate. It discusses 11 popular online multiplayer games, including Stardew Valley, Apex Legends, GTA Online, Halo Infinite, Forza Horizon 5, Minecraft, Destiny 2, Sea of Thieves, Call of Duty: Warzone, Fall Guys, Mario Kart 8: Deluxe, and Fortnite. \n \n Links: ['Skip to main content (https://www.gamesradar.com/best-online-games/#main)', '\\n\\nGamesRadar+\\n\\nGamesRadar+\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\nGamesRadar+ The Games, Movies, TV & Comics You Love\\n (https://www.gamesradar.com/uk/)', '\\n  (https://www.facebook.com/gamesradarplus/)', '\\n  (https://twitter.com/gamesradar)', '\\n  (https://www.youtube.com/user/GamesRadar)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "xdg-open https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/en-US/home"}}}'}]
"""
